metadata.title: CVE-2024-46726 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Ensure index calculation will not overflow[WHY & HOW]Make sure vmid0p72_idx, vnom0p8_idx and vmax0p9_idx calculation willnever overflow and exceess array size.This fixes 3 OVERRUN and 1 INTEGER_OVERFLOW issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
